subject: Golf
Deaths (Obituaries)
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Mr. Harison introduced everyone from Ben Hogan to Jack Nicklaus to Tiger Woods in 60 years as the starter on the first tee of the Masters.
snippet: Mr. Harison introduced everyone from Ben Hogan to Jack Nicklaus to Tiger Woods in 60 years as the starter on the first tee of the Masters.
